name: Legends of the Lost Realm II: Wilderlands
overview: Legends of the Lost Realm II: Wilderlands is an expansion to the original Legends of the Lost Realm and requires characters from the first game to be played. It takes place in the hinterlands of Tagor-Dal and the player gets to visit places like the sacred groves of the Faerie and the domain of the Hill Trolls. The game takes place right after the happenings of the first episode and rumours of another staff has reached the heroes. Now they have to travel into the wilderness in search for this staff. They will need it to defeat the black sorcerers in the final battle at the gates of Malakor. To survive the player not only has to defeat the many foes but also be aware of thirst, hunger, heat and cold. Not all people are enemies, there are also friendly NPCs that give clues on how to succeed.
